2.title: Life in a Note
2.text: One minute, I’m in the midst of imagining the most profound of possible outcomes: Fully believing for the fulfillment of wildest dreams, beginning to taste the sweetness of hope – barely able to be articulated – come to fruition. The next minute, I’m standing in full on recognition of the alternate possibility: An outcome 180 degrees the opposite of what I long for, scooting itself right on into the scene –  like a retriever puppy, propping itself at the window and scouring the back yard for his old ratty ball.
